item.title: PS：Convert a Color Picture to a Line Draft
item.author: Author
item.description: Here we use PS to convert a colorful pictrue to a line draft. Set up the PS software(e.g.PSCC) and input the picture that wo want to process. Click on the menu bar “Image->Adjust->Black and wihte”, or you can directly press the shortcut key"Alt+Shift+Ctrl+B". Then the image automatically turns to black and white. Click on the menu bar “Coverage->Copy coverage” to make a copy for our use.

item.title: PACK CHORME EXTENSIONS
item.author: Author
item.description: How to pack and download a chorme extension? If you fintagd a very nice extension and want to save to local or share with others. Here are steps: Select the button for the extension in the menu bar (usually right of the screen) then choose the extension you want to operate in the menu that pops up. Choose the “manage the extension” option then popuo a new page.

item.title: PythonTypeError：Only size-1 arrays can be converted to Python scalars
item.author: Author
item.description: Here are the sorce code: Calculate something to NTH power 1 2 3 4 5 6 import math import matplotlib.pyplot as plt plt.rcParams['font.sans-serif'] = ['SimHei'] r = np.arange(0, 1, 0.01) T_0 = pow(math.sqrt(1-pow(r,2)),-1) #error list L_0 = math.sqrt(1-pow(r,2)) #error list And the Error message: 1 TypeError: only size-1 arrays can be converted to Python scalars SOLUTION: Change the ‘math’ package to the “numpy” package. Here are the code:
